did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Local 1199 Bread and Roses Cultural Project Audio-Visual Materials, 1955-1996
did.origination:
National Union of Hospital and Nursing Home Employees (NUHHCE);
Local 1199 Drug and Hospital Union
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Primarily a video collection, this includes news footage, film of working conditions and strikes, documentary film about the Bread and Roses Cultural Project, film from several versions of the stage production "Take Care", healthcare crisis, AIDS, and May Day and Labor Day celebrations, among others.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Primarily a video collection, this includes news footage, film of working conditions and strikes, documentary film about the Bread and Roses Cultural Project, film from several versions of the stage production "Take Care", healthcare crisis, AIDS, and May Day and Labor Day celebrations, among others.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: National Union of Hospital and Nursing Home Employees.
National Union of Hospital and Nursing Home Employees. Local 1199 Drug & Hospital Union (New York, N.Y.)

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Labor unions -- Health facilities -- United States.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Local 1199 Bread and Roses Cultural Project Audio-Visual Materials #5929 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p:
